webinars.title: Computational Discovery of RNA-Specific Small Molecule Inhibitors Targeting the Conserved SL4 Region in SARS-CoV-2 Genome
webinars.organizer: 29th Annual International Conference on Research in Computational Molecular Biology (RECOMB-2025)
webinars.description: Presented a comprehensive virtual screening and molecular dynamics-based strategy to identify RNA-specific small molecule inhibitors targeting the SL4 region of the SARS-CoV-2 genome.

webinars.title: In Silico Investigation of Antiviral Phytochemicals Against Wild-Type and Omicron Variants of SARS-CoV-2
webinars.organizer: 1st Symposium on Emerging Frontiers of Biotechnology
webinars.description: Explored the antiviral potential of phytochemicals using in silico techniques against SARS-CoV-2 wild-type and Omicron variants through docking and molecular dynamics simulation.

webinars.title: From Local to Global: Navigating Funding and Building a Worldwide Research Network
webinars.organizer: 2nd International Colloquium on Bioinformatics Learning, Education, and Training (iCOBLET2024)
webinars.description: Provided guidance on acquiring research funding and establishing international collaborations for bioinformatics researchers and educators.

webinars.title: Development of miRNA-based Therapeutics against Zika Virus using Bioinformatics
webinars.organizer: 1st Asia & Pacific Bioinformatics Joint Conference, ISCB
webinars.description: Demonstrated a bioinformatics workflow for designing miRNA-based therapeutics targeting the Zika virus genome.

webinars.title: VaxiDB: A Database for Potential Antigens to Develop Novel Vaccines and Diagnostics
webinars.description: Introduced VaxiDB, a curated database of pathogen antigens aimed at accelerating vaccine and diagnostic development.

webinars.title: Development of miRNA-based Therapeutics against Zika Virus using Bioinformatics
webinars.description: Discussed the use of computational pipelines for designing miRNA-based antivirals against Zika virus infections.

webinars.title: Identification of Potential Phytochemicals as Immune Checkpoint Inhibitors
webinars.organizer: Past, Present, and Future of Cellular Immunotherapy
webinars.description: Investigated phytochemicals as potential PD-1/PDL-1 inhibitors using molecular modeling techniques.

webinars.title: Development of miRNA-Based Therapeutics for Liver Cancer Using Bioinformatics Approaches
webinars.organizer: 12th Annual Symposium on Global Cancer Research
webinars.description: Proposed a bioinformatics pipeline for identifying and validating miRNA-based therapies for liver cancer treatment.

webinars.title: Development of miRNA-based Therapeutics against Zika Virus using Bioinformatics
webinars.organizer: International Conference on Advances in Biotechnology (ICAB-2023)
webinars.description: Showcased the computational design of miRNA-targeting therapeutics for combating Zika virus infections.

webinars.title: In Silico Study of Antiviral Phytochemicals for SARS CoV2
webinars.organizer: International Conference on Nutrition, Medical Genomics, and Drug Discovery
webinars.description: Analyzed phytochemicals through computational techniques to assess their antiviral activity against SARS-CoV-2.

webinars.title: Beta-Coronavirus Genotyping for Armenian WGS isolates
webinars.description: Presented genotyping of Beta-coronavirus isolates from Armenia using whole genome sequencing data and phylogenetic tools.

webinars.title: International Conference cum Workshop on Translational Sciences in Drug Discovery and Development
webinars.organizer: Indian Science Congress Association & Department of Bioinformatics
webinars.description: Participated in a conference and workshop focused on bioinformatics tools and strategies for translational drug discovery.

webinars.title: Evaluation of Phytochemical and Antibacterial Properties of Andrographis Echiodies (L.). Nees
webinars.description: Explored the antibacterial properties and active compounds of Andrographis Echiodies using phytochemical screening techniques.

webinars.title: Studies on Probiotic Application in Growth and Intestinal Flora of Cat Fish
webinars.organizer: MCCCON-2019, DST & DBT Sponsored National Conference
webinars.description: Evaluated the role of probiotics in improving growth and intestinal health of catfish through microbial and nutritional analysis.

webinars.title: Controlling Environmental Pollution Using Bio-Plastic
webinars.description: Proposed the use of biodegradable bioplastics as an eco-friendly solution to tackle plastic pollution.

webinars.title: Isolation of Lactobacillus sp. from Curd and Its Application in Probiotic Chocolate
webinars.description: Demonstrated the isolation of Lactobacillus species from curd and their innovative use in probiotic chocolate products.

webinars.title: Bioremediation: A Green Approach to Pollution Control
webinars.organizer: National Seminar on Health and Ecology
webinars.description: Discussed the use of microbial techniques for environmental cleanup and the role of bioremediation in sustainable pollution management.
